kubejs.ponder.tag.tconstruct_at_home.des: Components related to melting, casting, and combining metals.
kubejs.ponder.advanced_melting_and_casti: Some metals' melting point is too high for normal blazes
To melt them, a seething blaze burner is required.
Metals that require superheating to melt can not be poured regularly
A casting spout and casting basin is needed.
The mold will be kept unless the casting basin is broken
Ingots that can be poured using a spout cool down faster
kubejs.ponder.melting_and_pouring.text_1: You can melt metals in basins.
kubejs.ponder.melting_and_pouring.text_2: To melt them, use a mixer and a blaze burner.
kubejs.ponder.melting_and_pouring.text_3: Molten metal can pe poured back into ingots.
kubejs.ponder.melting_and_pouring.text_4: A spout and an ingot mold is needed for this.
kubejs.ponder.melting_and_pouring.text_5: The mold will be consumed when using this method
kubejs.ponder.our_first_scene.header: Example scene for paper with structure
